00030 char *logtime() {
00031   static char rtn[128];
00032   static char tmp[64];
00033   static int first_time = 1;
00034   static struct timeval base;
00035   struct timeval now;
00036   struct tm nows;
00037   double diffs;
00038 
00039   if( first_time) {
00040     first_time=0;
00041     gettimeofday( &base, NULL);
00042     strftime(tmp, sizeof(tmp)-1, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S", localtime( &(base.tv_sec)));
00043     tmp[sizeof(tmp)-1]=0;
00044     snprintf( rtn, sizeof(rtn)-1, "%s.%06d", tmp, base.tv_usec);
00045     rtn[sizeof(rtn)-1]=0;
00046   } else {
00047     gettimeofday( &now, NULL);
00048     diffs =  (now.tv_sec - base.tv_sec);
00049     diffs += (now.tv_usec - base.tv_usec)/1000000.;
00050     snprintf( rtn, sizeof( rtn)-1, "%0.6f", diffs);
00051     rtn[sizeof(rtn)-1]=0;
00052   }
00053 
00054   return rtn;
00055 }

00059 void md2cmds_moveAbs(
00060                      char *cmd                  
00061                      ) {
00062   char *ignore;
00063   char *ptr;
00064   char *mtr;
00065   char *pos;
00066   double fpos;
00067   char *endptr;
00068   lspmac_motor_t *mp;
00069   int i;
00070 
00071   // Parse the command string
00072   //
00073   ignore = strtok_r( cmd, " ", &ptr);
00074   if( ignore == NULL) {
00075     //
00076     // Should generate error message
00077     // about blank command
00078     //
00079     return;
00080   }
00081 
00082   // The first string should be "moveAbs" cause that's how we got here.
00083   // Toss it.
00084   
00085   mtr = strtok_r( NULL, " ", &ptr);
00086   if( mtr == NULL) {
00087     lslogging_log_message( "md2cmds moveAbs error: missing motor name");
00088     return;
00089   }
00090 
00091   pos = strtok_r( NULL, " ", &ptr);
00092   if( pos == NULL) {
00093     lslogging_log_message( "md2cmds moveAbs error: missing position");
00094     return;
00095   }
00096 
00097   fpos = strtod( pos, &endptr);
00098   if( pos == endptr) {
00099     lslogging_log_message( "md2cmds moveAbs error: Can't decipher '%s' as a number", pos);
00100     return;
00101   }
00102   
00103   mp = NULL;
00104   for( i=0; i<lspmac_nmotors; i++) {
00105     if( strcmp( lspmac_motors[i].name, mtr) == 0) {
00106       mp = &(lspmac_motors[i]);
00107       break;
00108     }
00109   }
00110 
00111 
00112   if( mp != NULL && mp->moveAbs != NULL) {
00113     wprintw( term_output, "Moving %s to %f\n", mtr, fpos);
00114     wnoutrefresh( term_output);
00115     mp->moveAbs( mp, fpos);
00116   }
00117 
00118 }

00125 void md2cmds_mvcenter_prep() {
00126   //
00127   // Clears the motion flags for coordinate systems 2 and 3
00128   // Then sets them.
00129   // Each time we wait until we've read back
00130   // the changed values
00131   //
00132   // This guarantees that when we are waiting for motion to stop that it did, in fact, start
00133   //
00134 
00135   //
00136   // Clear the centering and alignment stage flags
00137   //
00138   lspmac_SockSendline( "M7075=(M7075 | 6) ^ 6");
00139 
00140   //
00141   // Make sure it propagates
00142   //
00143   pthread_mutex_lock( &lspmac_moving_mutex);
00144   while( lspmac_moving_flags & 6)
00145     pthread_cond_wait( &lspmac_moving_cond, &lspmac_moving_mutex);
00146   pthread_mutex_unlock( &lspmac_moving_mutex);
00147 
00148   //
00149   // Set the centering and alignment stage flags
00150   //
00151   lspmac_SockSendline( "M7075=(M7075 | 6)");
00152 
00153   //
00154   // Make sure it propagates
00155   //
00156   pthread_mutex_lock( &lspmac_moving_mutex);
00157   while( (lspmac_moving_flags & 6) == 0)
00158     pthread_cond_wait( &lspmac_moving_cond, &lspmac_moving_mutex);
00159   pthread_mutex_unlock( &lspmac_moving_mutex);
00160 }
00161 
00164 void md2cmds_mvcenter_move(
00165                            double cx,   
00166                            double cy,   
00167                            double ax,   
00168                            double ay,   
00169                            double az    
00170                            ) {
00171   //
00172   // centering stage is coordinate system 2
00173   // alignment stage is coordinate system 3
00174   //
00175   
00176   double cx_cts, cy_cts, ax_cts, ay_cts, az_cts;
00177 
00178   cx_cts = cenx->u2c   * cx;
00179   cy_cts = ceny->u2c   * cy;
00180   ax_cts = alignx->u2c * ax;
00181   ay_cts = aligny->u2c * ay;
00182   az_cts = alignz->u2c * az;
00183 
00184   lspmac_SockSendline( "M7075=(M7075 | 2) &2 Q100=2 Q20=%.1f Q21=%.1f B150R", cx_cts, cy_cts);
00185   lspmac_SockSendline( "M7075=(M7075 | 4) &3 Q100=4 Q30=%.1f Q31=%.1f Q32=%.1f B160R", ax_cts, ay_cts, az_cts);
00186   
00187 }
00188 
00191 void md2cmds_mvcenter_wait() {
00192   //
00193   // Just wait until the motion flags are lowered
00194   //
00195 
00196   pthread_mutex_lock( &lspmac_moving_mutex);
00197   while( lspmac_moving_flags & 6)
00198     pthread_cond_wait( &lspmac_moving_cond, &lspmac_moving_mutex);
00199   pthread_mutex_unlock( &lspmac_moving_mutex);
00200 }

00205 void md2cmds_collect() {
00206   long long skey;
00207   double p170;  // start cnts
00208   double p171;  // end cnts
00209   double p173;  // omega velocity cnts/msec
00210   double p175;  // acceleration time (msec)
00211   double p180;  // exposure time (msec)
00212   FILE *zzlog;
00213   struct timeval tt_base, tt_now;
00214   int center_request;
00215 
00216   zzlog = fopen( "/tmp/collect_log.txt", "w");
00217   fprintf( zzlog, "%s: Start md2cmds\n", logtime());
00218   fflush( zzlog);
00219 
00220   //
00221   // reset shutter has opened flag
00222   //
00223   lspmac_SockSendline( "P3001=0 P3002=0");
00224 
00225 
00226   while( 1) {
00227     fprintf( zzlog, "%s: call lspg_nextshot_call\n", logtime());
00228     fflush( zzlog);
00229     lspg_nextshot_call();
00230 
00231     //
00232     // This is where we'd tell the md2 to move the organs into position
00233     //
00234 
00235     fprintf( zzlog, "%s: call lspg_nextshot_wait\n", logtime());
00236     fflush( zzlog);
00237 
00238     lspg_nextshot_wait();
00239     fprintf( zzlog, "%s: returned from  lspg_nextshot_wait\n", logtime());
00240     fflush( zzlog);
00241 
00242     if( lspg_nextshot.no_rows_returned) {
00243       lspg_nextshot_done();
00244       break;
00245     }
00246 
00247     skey = lspg_nextshot.skey;
00248     lspg_query_push( NULL, "SELECT px.shots_set_state(%lld, 'Preparing')", skey);
00249 
00250     center_request = 0;
00251     if( lspg_nextshot.active) {
00252       if(
00253          (fabs( lspg_nextshot.cx - cenx->position) > 0.1) ||
00254          (fabs( lspg_nextshot.cy - ceny->position) > 0.1) ||
00255          (fabs( lspg_nextshot.ax - alignx->position) > 0.1) ||
00256          (fabs( lspg_nextshot.ay - aligny->position) > 0.1) ||
00257          (fabs( lspg_nextshot.az - alignz->position) > 0.1)) {
00258 
00259         center_request = 1;
00260         md2cmds_mvcenter_prep();
00261         md2cmds_mvcenter_move( lspg_nextshot.cx, lspg_nextshot.cy, lspg_nextshot.ax, lspg_nextshot.ay, lspg_nextshot.az);
00262       }
00263     }
00264 
00265     if( !lspg_nextshot.dsphi_isnull) {
00266       lspmac_moveabs_queue( phi, lspg_nextshot.dsphi);
00267     }
00268   
00269     if( !lspg_nextshot.dskappa_isnull) {
00270       lspmac_moveabs_queue( kappa, lspg_nextshot.dskappa);
00271     }
00272 
00273   
00274     //
00275     // Wait for all those motors to stop
00276     //
00277     if( center_request) {
00278       md2cmds_mvcenter_wait();
00279     }
00280 
00281     if( !lspg_nextshot.dsphi_isnull) {
00282       lspmac_moveabs_wait( phi);
00283     }
00284   
00285     if( !lspg_nextshot.dskappa_isnull) {
00286       lspmac_moveabs_wait( kappa);
00287     }
00288 
00289     //
00290     // Calculate the parameters we'll need to run the scan
00291     //
00292     p180 = lspg_nextshot.dsexp * 1000.0;
00293     p170 = omega->u2c * lspg_nextshot.sstart;
00294     //    p171 = omega->u2c * ( lspg_nextshot.sstart + lspg_nextshot.dsowidth);
00295     p171 = omega->u2c * lspg_nextshot.dsowidth;
00296     p173 = fabs(p180) < 1.e-4 ? 0.0 : omega->u2c * lspg_nextshot.dsowidth / p180;
00297     p175 = p173/omega->max_accel;
00298 
00299 
00300     //
00301     // free up access to nextshot
00302     //
00303     lspg_nextshot_done();
00304 
00305     fprintf( zzlog, "%s: finished with lspg_nextshot_done, calling lspg_seq_run_prep_all\n", logtime());
00306     fflush( zzlog);
00307 
00308     //
00309     // prepare the database and detector to expose
00310     // On exit we own the diffractometer lock and
00311     // have checked that all is OK with the detector
00312     //
00313     lspg_seq_run_prep_all( skey,
00314                            kappa->position,
00315                            phi->position,
00316                            cenx->position,
00317                            ceny->position,
00318                            alignx->position,
00319                            aligny->position,
00320                            alignz->position
00321                            );
00322 
00323     
00324     fprintf( zzlog, "%s: finished with lspg_seq_run_prep_all\n", logtime());
00325     fflush( zzlog);
00326     //
00327     // make sure our has opened flag is down
00328     // wait for the p3001=0 command to be noticed
00329     //
00330     pthread_mutex_lock( &lspmac_shutter_mutex);
00331     if( lspmac_shutter_has_opened == 1)
00332       pthread_cond_wait( &lspmac_shutter_cond, &lspmac_shutter_mutex);
00333     pthread_mutex_unlock( &lspmac_shutter_mutex);
00334 
00335     //
00336     // Start the exposure
00337     //
00338     lspmac_SockSendline( "P170=%.1f P171=%.1f P173=%.1f P174=0 P175=%.1f P176=0 P177=1 P178=0 P180=%.1f M431=1 &1B131R",
00339                          p170,      p171,     p173,            p175,                          p180);
00340 
00341 
00342     fprintf( zzlog, "%s: sent command to pmac\n", logtime());
00343     fflush( zzlog);
00344 
00345     //
00346     // wait for the shutter to open
00347     //
00348     pthread_mutex_lock( &lspmac_shutter_mutex);
00349     if( lspmac_shutter_has_opened == 0)
00350       pthread_cond_wait( &lspmac_shutter_cond, &lspmac_shutter_mutex);
00351 
00352     fprintf( zzlog, "%s: shutter has opened\n", logtime());
00353     fflush( zzlog);
00354 
00355     //
00356     // wait for the shutter to close
00357     //
00358     if( lspmac_shutter_state == 1)
00359       pthread_cond_wait( &lspmac_shutter_cond, &lspmac_shutter_mutex);
00360     pthread_mutex_unlock( &lspmac_shutter_mutex);
00361 
00362     fprintf( zzlog, "%s: shutter now closed, unlocking diffractometer\n", logtime());
00363     fflush( zzlog);
00364 
00365 
00366     lspg_query_push( NULL, "SELECT px.unlock_diffractometer()");
00367 
00368     fprintf( zzlog, "%s: unlocked diffractometer\n", logtime());
00369     fflush( zzlog);
00370 
00371     lspg_query_push( NULL, "SELECT px.shots_set_state(%lld, 'Writing')", skey);
00372 
00373     //
00374     // reset shutter has opened flag
00375     //
00376     lspmac_SockSendline( "P3001=0");
00377     //
00378     // TODO:
00379     // wait for omega to stop moving then position it for the next frame
00380     //
00381 
00382 
00383     if( !lspg_nextshot.active2_isnull && lspg_nextshot.active2) {
00384       if(
00385          (fabs( lspg_nextshot.cx2 - cenx->position) > 0.1) ||
00386          (fabs( lspg_nextshot.cy2 - ceny->position) > 0.1) ||
00387          (fabs( lspg_nextshot.ax2 - alignx->position) > 0.1) ||
00388          (fabs( lspg_nextshot.ay2 - aligny->position) > 0.1) ||
00389          (fabs( lspg_nextshot.az2 - alignz->position) > 0.1)) {
00390 
00391         center_request = 1;
00392         md2cmds_mvcenter_prep();
00393         md2cmds_mvcenter_move( lspg_nextshot.cx, lspg_nextshot.cy, lspg_nextshot.ax, lspg_nextshot.ay, lspg_nextshot.az);
00394         md2cmds_mvcenter_wait();
00395       }
00396     }
00397 
00398   }
00399   fprintf( zzlog, "%s: done\n", logtime());
00400   fflush( zzlog);
00401   fclose( zzlog);
00402 }

00407 void md2cmds_rotate() {
00408   //
00409   // BLUMax disables scintilator here.
00410   //
00411 
00412   //
00413   // get the new center information
00414   //
00415   lspg_getcenter_call();
00416 
00417   lspg_getcenter_wait();
00418 
00419 
00420   // put up the back light
00421   blight_ud->moveAbs( blight_ud, 1);
00422 
00423   if( lspg_getcenter.no_rows_returned) {
00424     //
00425     // the other case is considered below
00426     // Bottom line, zoom is always defined
00427     //
00428     zoom->moveAbs( zoom, 1);    // default zoom is 1
00429   }
00430 
00431 
00432   if( lspg_getcenter.no_rows_returned == 0) {
00433     double cx, cy, ax, ay, az;
00434 
00435     if( lspg_getcenter.zoom_isnull == 0) {
00436       zoom->moveAbs( zoom, lspg_getcenter.zoom);
00437     } else {
00438       zoom->moveAbs( zoom, 1);
00439     }
00440 
00441     //
00442     // OK, why not just implement a nice getter that does the locking transparently?  UGLY!
00443     //
00444     pthread_mutex_lock( &(cenx->mutex));
00445     cx = cenx->position;
00446     pthread_mutex_unlock( &(cenx->mutex));
00447     if( lspg_getcenter.dcx_isnull == 0)
00448       cx += lspg_getcenter.dcx;
00449 
00450     pthread_mutex_lock( &(ceny->mutex));
00451     cy = ceny->position;
00452     pthread_mutex_unlock( &(ceny->mutex));
00453     if( lspg_getcenter.dcy_isnull == 0)
00454       cy  += lspg_getcenter.dcy;
00455                           
00456     pthread_mutex_lock( &(alignx->mutex));
00457     ax = alignx->position;
00458     pthread_mutex_unlock( &(alignx->mutex));
00459     if( lspg_getcenter.dax_isnull == 0)
00460       ax  += lspg_getcenter.dax;
00461 
00462     pthread_mutex_lock( &(aligny->mutex));
00463     ay = aligny->position;
00464     pthread_mutex_unlock( &(aligny->mutex));
00465     if( lspg_getcenter.day_isnull == 0)
00466       ay  += lspg_getcenter.day;
00467                           
00468     pthread_mutex_lock( &(alignz->mutex));
00469     az = alignz->position;
00470     pthread_mutex_unlock( &(alignz->mutex));
00471     if( lspg_getcenter.daz_isnull == 0)
00472       az  += lspg_getcenter.daz;
00473                           
00474     md2cmds_mvcenter_move( cx, cy, ax, ay, az);
00475     md2cmds_mvcenter_wait();
00476   }
00477   lspg_getcenter_done();
00478 
00479   // Home omega
00480   lspmac_SockSendline("M401=1 M1115=1 #1$ &1B1R");
00481 
00482   
00483   
00484   
00485 }

00494 
00497 void *md2cmds_worker(
00498                      void *dummy                
00499                      ) {
00500 
00501   pthread_mutex_lock( &md2cmds_mutex);
00502 
00503   while( 1) {
00504     //
00505     // wait for someone to give us a command (and tell us they did so)
00506     //
00507     while( md2cmds_cmd[0] == 0)
00508       pthread_cond_wait( &md2cmds_cond, &md2cmds_mutex);
00509 
00510     if( strcmp( md2cmds_cmd, "transfer") == 0) {
00511       md2cmds_transfer();
00512     } else if( strcmp( md2cmds_cmd, "collect") == 0) {
00513       md2cmds_collect();
00514     } else if( strcmp( md2cmds_cmd, "rotate") == 0) {
00515       md2cmds_rotate();
00516     } else if( strcmp( md2cmds_cmd, "center") == 0) {
00517       md2cmds_center();
00518     } else if( strncmp( md2cmds_cmd, "moveAbs", 7) == 0) {
00519       md2cmds_moveAbs( md2cmds_cmd);
00520     }
00521 
00522     md2cmds_cmd[0] = 0;
00523   }
00524 }
00525 
00526 
00529 void md2cmds_init() {
00530   memset( md2cmds_cmd, 0, sizeof( md2cmds_cmd));
00531 
00532   pthread_mutex_init( &md2cmds_mutex, NULL);
00533   pthread_cond_init( &md2cmds_cond, NULL);
00534 
00535   pthread_mutex_init( &md2cmds_pg_mutex, NULL);
00536   pthread_cond_init( &md2cmds_pg_cond, NULL);
00537 
00538 }
00539 
00542 void md2cmds_run() {
00543   pthread_create( &md2cmds_thread, NULL, md2cmds_worker, NULL);
00544 }
